<S%H518>If<s%> you will not <S%H8085>hear,<s%> and <S%H518>if<s%> you will not <S%H7760>lay<s%> it to <S%H3820>heart,<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H3519>glory<s%> to my <S%H8034>name,<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> I will even <S%H7971>send<s%> a <S%H3994>curse<s%> on you, and I will <S%H779>curse<s%> your <S%H1293>blessings:<s%> <S%H1571>yes,<s%> I have <S%H779>cursed<s%> them already, <S%H3588>because<s%> you do not <S%H7760>lay<s%> it to <S%H3820>heart.<s%>

Therefore have I <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H5414>made<s%> you <S%H959>contemptible<s%> and <S%H8217>base<s%> before <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H6310>according<s%> as you have not <S%H8104>kept<s%> my <S%H1870>ways,<s%> but have been <S%H5375>partial<s%> <S%H6440><s%> in the <S%H8451>law.<s%>

Have we not <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H2>father?<s%> has not <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H1254>created<s%> us? <S%H4069>why<s%> do we deal <S%H898>treacherously<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> against his <S%H251>brother,<s%> by <S%H2490>profaning<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of our <S%H1>fathers?<s%>

And did not he <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H259>one?<s%> Yet had he the <S%H7605>residue<s%> of the <S%H7307>spirit.<s%> And <S%H4100>why<s%> <S%H259>one?<s%> That he might <S%H1245>seek<s%> a <S%H430>godly<s%> <S%H2233>seed.<s%> Therefore take <S%H8104>heed<s%> to your <S%H7307>spirit,<s%> and let <S%H408>none<s%> deal <S%H898>treacherously<s%> against the <S%H802>wife<s%> of his <S%H5271>youth.<s%>

For the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> that he <S%H8130>hates<s%> <S%H7971>putting<s%> away: for one <S%H3680>covers<s%> <S%H2555>violence<s%> with his <S%H3830>garment,<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts:<s%> therefore take <S%H8104>heed<s%> to your <S%H7307>spirit,<s%> that you deal not <S%H898>treacherously.<s%>

You have <S%H3021>wearied<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> with your <S%H1697>words.<s%> Yet you <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H4100>Wherein<s%> have we <S%H3021>wearied<s%> him? When you <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3605>Every<s%> one that <S%H6213>does<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> is <S%H2896>good<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and he <S%H2654>delights<s%> in them; <S%H176>or,<s%> <S%H346>Where<s%> is the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H4941>judgment?<s%>
